title: Image of the Region
text: The region is depicted in the following figure.\n##figure1.gif##

title: The value of 𝜌
text: Since we are only asked for the centroid of the region, rather than the mass or moments of the associated lamina, we know the density constant 𝜌 cancels out of the calculations eventually. Therefore, for the sake of convenience, let’s assume $$𝜌=1$$.
